actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to insure that beneficiaries under the Servicemen's Group Life Insurance Program of certain members of the Armed Forces in missing status are not denied the benefits of such program.

summary.text: Provides that beneficiaries under the Servicemen's Group Life Insurance Program of members of the Armed Forces in missing status between February 28, 1961, and September 29, 1965, shall be assured benefits under the program. (Adds 38 U.S.C. 777)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to insure that beneficiaries under the Servicemen's Group Life Insurance Program of certain members of the Armed Forces in missing status are not denied the benefits of such program.
